When these things hatch, it's the only time I have ever caught carp in our local river using topwater lures.  Usually carp only feed at the bottom, but they become used to slurping these things from the surface.  I have caught catfish using topwater lures very occasionally, but you'll even catch a load of them on the top when they used to eating the cicadas at the surface.  All you need is any smaller topwater plug, just cast it out and just twitch it in place like a bug that just landed on the water.
